sectionNotes: Restricted to students with Senior class standing.
sectionText: Senior priority enrollment begins November 2nd. Junior priority enrollment begins November 9th.Open enrollment begins at 10am on November 21st. Presents an overview and analysis of historical and current theory and research on moral psychology. Explores development of morality, moral reasoning and decision-making, rational and biased inputs to moral judgments, moral emotions, moral impression formation and person perception. Emphasis is on the social psychology of morality, but other perspectives such as developmental, cognitive, political, and individual differences will be explored. **Approved for General and Social/Personality Psychology Concentration**
